description: The main objective of the programme is to provide a preparatory assistance to support the Government of the Maldives to lay the groundwork to initiate its programme for decentralized governance.

subproject.description: Aims to provide preparatory assistance to support the Government of the Maldives to lay the groundwork to initiate its programme for decentralised governance.
